scripts.build: ng build && npm run copy-htaccess && npm run copy-missing-assets
scripts.copy-htaccess: if exist public\.htaccess (copy public\.htaccess dist\kurtkoy-otel\browser\.htaccess) & if exist public\htaccess.txt (copy public\htaccess.txt dist\kurtkoy-otel\browser\htaccess.txt) & if exist public\HTACCESS-ICERIGI.txt (copy public\HTACCESS-ICERIGI.txt dist\kurtkoy-otel\browser\HTACCESS-ICERIGI.txt) & if exist public\web.config (copy public\web.config dist\kurtkoy-otel\browser\web.config) & if exist public\NATRO-KURULUM.txt (copy public\NATRO-KURULUM.txt dist\kurtkoy-otel\browser\NATRO-KURULUM.txt)
scripts.copy-missing-assets: powershell -Command "$files = Get-ChildItem 'src\assets\images' -File | Where-Object { $_.Name -like '*logo*' -or $_.Name -like '*pendik*' }; foreach ($f in $files) { $dest = 'dist\kurtkoy-otel\browser\assets\images\' + $f.Name; Copy-Item $f.FullName -Destination $dest -Force }"
